passive.name: GLORIOUS EVOLUTION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) GLORIOUS EVOLUTION
                                Gains Hex Fragments whenever Viktor kills an enemy:- Killing minions or normal monsters grants 3 Hex Fragments. - Killing epic monsters, siege units, or super minions grants 5 Hex Fragments. - Champion takedowns grant 25 Hex Fragments.Every 100 Hex Fragments Viktor gains permanently upgrades an active ability. When all of his basic abilities are upgraded, the Hexcore will be perfected, augmenting Chaos Storm.

q.name: (Q) SIPHON POWER
q.description:
(Q) SIPHON POWER
 8/7/6/5s   65 
                                
                                
                                Blasts an enemy, dealing 45 magic damage (45/60/75/90 + 30% ) and gaining a shield that absorbs up to 30 damage (30/55/80/105 + 15% ) over 2.5 seconds.Discharge: The next attack within 3.5 seconds deals 74 bonus magic damage (20/40/60/80 + 100%  + 40% ).Upgrade - Turbocharge: This ability's shield absorbs up to 50 damage (50/90/130/170 + 25% ), and Viktor gains 30% bonus Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.

w.name: (W) GRAVITY FIELD
w.description:
(W) GRAVITY FIELD
 13/12/11/10s   65 
                                
                                
                                Deploys a gravity field for 4 seconds, slowing enemies within by 25/30/35/40%. After a short delay, the field applies a Gravitation stack to the target every 0.5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.At 3 stacks, all stacks are consumed to stun the target for 1.5 seconds. The target then becomes immune to Gravitation for a short duration.Upgrade - Slow: The first time Siphon Power, Death Ray and Chaos Storm deal damage to enemies slow them by an additional 20%.

e.name: (E) DEATH RAY
e.description:
(E) DEATH RAY
 10/9/8/7s   60 
                                
                                
                                Fires a chaos beam that cuts across the battlefield in a line, dealing 75 magic damage (75/120/165/210 + 30% ) to enemies in its path.Upgrade - Blastquake: After a brief delay, an explosion follows the beam's wake, dealing 30 magic damage (30/70/110/150 + 60% ).Tap: Automatically attacks nearby targets based on your auto-aim settings.Drag: Drag the ability button to set the beam's starting point. After that, the ability automatically attacks nearby targets based on your auto-aim settings.Precise cast: 1. Drag the ability button to set the beam's starting point, and hold it until you are ready to fire.2. Tap the checkmark at the top-left corner to confirm, or the cross button near it to cancel.3. Drag the ability button to aim the beam in the target direction. Release to cast.

r.name: (R) CHAOS STORM
r.description:
(R) CHAOS STORM
 75/65/55s   100 
                                
                                
                                Conjures a Chaos Storm at the target location for 5.5 seconds, dealing 100 magic damage (100/175/250 + 60% ) to enemies within the area and disrupting their channeled abilities. The storm then deals 50 magic damage (50/80/110 + 35% ) to enemies within it every second.Hold and drag the ability button after cast to direct the storm to another location.Upgrade - Howl: Chaos Storm moves faster. Champion takedowns empower the storm, extending its duration by 3.5 seconds and increasing its area of effect. The storm can be empowered up to 5 time(s).The closer the storm is to Viktor, the faster it moves.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
situational_items_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.

keystone_detailed.description: You and your nearby ally gain a shield when either of you would take damage from an enemy champion.

runes_detailed.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
